description:
Mikazuki was the pirate that http://anidb.net/ch3262 [Galley-La] beat after being threatened by him. He is the captain and only known member of the Big Helmet Pirates. He wears a large spherical helmet similar to http://anidb.net/ch3529 [Kokoro]`s with a crescent moon on it and has large canines resembling a demon.
He has a bounty of 36,000,000 Beli. He is later seen in the fillers working for the debt collectors but he is easily defeated by http://anidb.net/ch475 [Zoro]. His name is Japanese for "crescent moon".
name: Mikazuki
